tool_description: A web scraping API with built-in proxies, JS rendering, and HTML parsing.
name: WebScraping.AI
title: WebScraping.AI

api_list.name: getSelected
api_list.description: Returns just HTML on success, JSON on error

optional_parameters.name: js
optional_parameters.description: Execute on-page JavaScript using a headless browser (true by default)

optional_parameters.name: timeout
optional_parameters.description: Maximum processing time in ms. Increase it in case of timeout errors (5000 by default, maximum is 30000)

optional_parameters.name: proxy
optional_parameters.description: Type of proxy, use residential proxies if your site restricts traffic from datacenters (datacenter by default). Note that residential proxy requests are more expensive than datacenter, see the pricing page for details.

optional_parameters.name: selector
optional_parameters.description: CSS selector (null by default, returns whole page HTML)

optional_parameters.name: headers
optional_parameters.description: HTTP headers to pass to the target page. Can be specified either via a nested query parameter (...&headers[One]=value1&headers=[Another]=value2) or as a JSON encoded object (...&headers={"One": "value1", "Another": "value2"})

api_list.name: getHTML
api_list.description: Returns just HTML on success, JSON on error

optional_parameters.name: js
optional_parameters.description: Execute on-page JavaScript using a headless browser (true by default)

optional_parameters.name: timeout
optional_parameters.description: Maximum processing time in ms. Increase it in case of timeout errors (5000 by default, maximum is 30000)

optional_parameters.name: headers
optional_parameters.description: HTTP headers to pass to the target page. Can be specified either via a nested query parameter (...&headers[One]=value1&headers=[Another]=value2) or as a JSON encoded object (...&headers={"One": "value1", "Another": "value2"})

optional_parameters.name: proxy
optional_parameters.description: Type of proxy, use residential proxies if your site restricts traffic from datacenters (datacenter by default). Note that residential proxy requests are more expensive than datacenter, see the pricing page for details.

api_list.name: getSelectedMultiple

optional_parameters.name: js
optional_parameters.description: Execute on-page JavaScript using a headless browser (true by default)

optional_parameters.name: headers
optional_parameters.description: HTTP headers to pass to the target page. Can be specified either via a nested query parameter (...&headers[One]=value1&headers=[Another]=value2) or as a JSON encoded object (...&headers={"One": "value1", "Another": "value2"})

optional_parameters.name: timeout
optional_parameters.description: Maximum processing time in ms. Increase it in case of timeout errors (5000 by default, maximum is 30000)

optional_parameters.name: proxy
optional_parameters.description: Type of proxy, use residential proxies if your site restricts traffic from datacenters (datacenter by default). Note that residential proxy requests are more expensive than datacenter, see the pricing page for details.

optional_parameters.name: selectors
optional_parameters.description: Multiple CSS selectors (null by default, returns whole page HTML)

schema.description: Array of elements matched by selectors
schema.title: HTML for selected page areas
